//Gray Codes:::@anil
#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<bitset>
#include<cctype>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int T;
	int N;
	int res;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	{
		res=0;
		scanf("%d",&N);

		while(N)
			{
				res=res^N;
				N=N>>1;
			}
		printf("%d\n",res);

	}
return 0;
}
